message: Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product at a price of $1,100,000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a reasonable price, and I'm willing to make a deal at this point.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $1,050,000 is my absolute bottom line.  Let's meet in the middle and make this deal happen.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm not quite ready to pay $1,050,000. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best price, but $950,000 is still too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway on our last offers.  Let's make this a deal at $1,000,000. It's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $975,000 for the product, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
